verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi tabe ucca kariyā
prabhura kāṇe kṛṣṇa-nāma kahe bhakta-gaṇa lañā

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosāñi; tabe—at that time; ucca kariyā—very loudly; prabhura kāṇe—in the ear of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; kahe—began to chant; bhakta-gaṇa lañā—with all the other devotees.
translation: When they saw this, Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī and all the other devotees began to chant the holy name of Kṛṣṇa very loudly into Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's ear.
